definition: Khampa, subdivision of Tibetan ethnic group/former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan
healthy/peaceful/abundant
surname Kang
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan
former Kham province of Tibet, now split between Tibet and Sichuan

sentences.english: Broad boulevards are unimpeded by traffic in the new district, called Kangbashi New Area.
sentences.chinese: 寬闊的馬路暢通無阻的縱橫在名叫康巴什的新城。

sentences.english: A deserted street in the Kangbashi district of the town of Ordos in China's Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 中國內蒙古自治區鄂爾多斯康巴什區的一條廢棄街道。

sentences.english: “I bought two places in Kangbashi, one for my own use and one as an investment,” said Mr.
sentences.chinese: 我在康巴什買了兩處房產，一處自住，一處用作投資。

sentences.english: For Dok Kham Tai at the Rai overseas airport also. no actual precipitation for the month of May.
sentences.chinese: 牘康巴萊機場也是一樣，五月份沒有確實的降雨量。

sentences.english: It's only a part of that city the Kangbashi district that is considered a ghost city.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市只有一部分也就是康巴什區才被叫做鬼城。

sentences.english: This place contains one of the greatest of the twenty-five sacred places in Khampa areas.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有康巴藏區二十五大聖地之王的章龍貝瑪喜布。

definition: former Kham province of Tibet, now split between Tibet and Sichuan

Garze or Kandze, capital of Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], formerly in Kham province of Tibet, present Sichuan
Dawu county (Tibetan: rta 'u rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan
Batang county (Tibetan: 'ba' thang rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Shambhala, mythical place (Buddhism, Hinduism)

Zhongba county, Tibetan: 'Brong pa rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet
Dartsendo, Dardo or Kangding county (Tibetan: dar mdo rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
